value: I am the creator of Caelesti, a work-in-progress Minecraft resource pack, fuelled by the additional creative capabilities provided by Optifine.
I also work on a number of datapacks, which also make use of niche features within Optifine to add new content to Minecraft.
Feel free to poke around my website, and be sure to have fun!
My main resource pack, trimmed down to work with vanilla Minecraft.
A datapack I've been working on since the dawn of time.
